clientOrderId.description: Mandatory. Client-side order identifier. Used to prevent duplicate orders.

clientOrderTag.description: Optional. Any user's info to be stored along the invoice

instrument.description: Mandatory. Name of instument for the order.

feeModel.description: Optional. Fee model applied to the order (override merchant default fee model for the instument)

autoStart.title: If true, invoice will start immediately, otherwise will suspend in status NEW and will waiting for start processing request.

createOrderBuySell.title: Extends common create order for fields "fiatCurrency" and "cryptoCurrency"

amount.title: Invoice amount (string in decimal form, like "1.23")

amountCurrency.title: Currency in which amount provided (like: BTC, USD)
